name: Running Fairy
description:
This game was developed during the KLUJAM 2016.

Topics were movement and two story cubes, showing the fairy and the bowl of food.

While the jam took place from Friday afternoon until Sunday afternoon I did (almost) nothing on Saturday. In other words, for me it was a 24h instead of 48h jam. I ended up with too little time for the actual game, none for sound and almost none for graphics (what you see are actually modified story cube images).

In game controls are left and right arrow keys to change direction, R to restart. Escape or Return also usually do something.

The Windows and OSX versions are untested, please tell me if the game does not run there.
